text: The following lists events that happened in 1956 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Ólafur Thors, Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== Helgi Ólafsson *21 April - Jóhann Sigurðarson, actor and singer *16 May - Þorbergur Aðalsteinsson, handball player *29 May - Bjarni Friðriksson, judoka *30 July - Árni Sigfússon, politician *15 August - Helgi Ólafsson, chess grandmaster *27 August - Magnús Bergs, footballer *21 September - Jón Gunnarsson, politician. ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1956 in Iceland
